preferences.name: apikey
preferences.title: API Key
preferences.description: find at https://xxx.campfirenow.com/member/edit, where xxx is your domain

preferences.name: filterRegex
preferences.title: Filter Regex
preferences.description: JS regular expression that messages must match to be shown, e.g. 'Zach B:'. Passed into RegExp() and case-insensitive. Blank shows all messages.
